text: A gubernatorial election was held on 7 April 2019 to elect the next Governor of Ōita. == Candidates == *Katsusada Hirose back by national LDP and Komeito. *Kai Yamashita for the JCP. *Yoshiko Shutō. == Results == http://shingetsunewsagency.com/2019/04/13/conservative-landslide-in-unified- local-elections/ == References == Category:2019 elections in Japan Category:Gubernatorial elections in Japan Category:April 2019 events in Japan Category:Politics of Ōita Prefecture
title: 2019 Ōita gubernatorial election
